title: The Bongino Brief - Dec 19, 2020
description:
After Joe and Jill Biden appeared with Stephen Colbert, and the "Dr. Jill Biden" controversy was mentioned, Dan calls out the double standard used by the media and unfunny comics like Samantha Bee.
